meanings.sent1: The sponge was squishier than the rock.
meanings.sent2: The marshmallow is squishier than the gummy bear.
meanings.sent3: The squishier the pillow, the better the nap!
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt squishier than a ripe peach, full of love.
meanings.sent5: The mud was so squishier, it oozed between his fingers.

meanings.sent1: The ripe tomato felt squishier than the firm apple.
meanings.sent2: The jellyfish is squishier than the seashell.
meanings.sent3: The squishier jelly made the sandwich extra delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, wet from the rain, was squishier than a sponge.
meanings.sent5: The wet sand was squishier than expected, making walking difficult.

meanings.definition: Becoming softer when pressed or squeezed
meanings.sent1: The stress ball becomes squishier when squeezed tightly.
meanings.sent2: The playdough gets squishier as you mold it in your hands.
meanings.sent3: The squishier the stress ball, the more satisfying the squeeze.
meanings.sent4: His resolve felt squishier than expected when faced with temptation.
meanings.sent5: The snow became squishier underfoot as the temperature rose.
